summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Desktop Guardian application. Backend API fully functional with all endpoints working. Frontend loads successfully with proper integration to backend APIs. WebSocket shows expected 'Offline' status due to missing websockets library as noted in requirements.

minor_issues.impact: WebSocket status shows 'Offline' but HTTP polling works correctly
minor_issues.note: This is expected behavior as mentioned in review requirements

minor_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings in console

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity and session management
Simple plan execution (time queries with auto-execution)
File operations with approval workflow (write, read, delete)
Privilege request and approval flow for outside-sandbox operations
Frontend page loading with all required data-testids
Command input and plan proposal functionality
Root change dialog and privilege request UI
Action log updates via HTTP polling

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core functionality working, minor console warnings only)
